column4: How can I copy files from a remote server using a terminal based ssh, to a directory on my computer?
rukuartic , could you be more specific?
just type ssh:address to the address bar in nautilus on the local machine
where can I find the address bar?
I can't seem to find the address bar
it depend on how you have nautilus set up. ctrl-l might work
i use nautilus in "browser" mode. I can't remeber the setting in spatial etc
all right, i'm almost there, but what do I do if my login on the server is different than my login on my local machine?
